categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Tal Bota was a human male Jedi Master who lived long before the High Republic Era, in a time where he often fought the Sith. By the era of the High Republic, Bota was considered an iconic Jedi, and younglings such as Lula Talisola and Farzala Tarabal watched holostories of his exploits. In the holovids, which were heavily fictionalized, Bota was depicted as going on solo missions where he fought dozens of Sith minions at once and pulled Star Cruisers out of the sky single-handedly. Bota was depicted in the holograms as having dark brown skin and black hair, wearing brown and cream Jedi robes and wielding a blue-bladed lightsaber.
